tools.name: browser_operator
tools.description: Operates a browser to navigate websites, click elements, and fill forms. You can use this to assist with web browsing tasks.

browser_id.description: Optional browser instance ID to use an existing browser. If not provided, a new browser will be created.

instruction.description: The instruction to perform in the browser, such as 'navigate to google.com', 'click the search button', etc.

browser_id.description: The browser instance ID to reset.
